name: Seraphayre Ephemera
description: Walk in the echo of an ethereal song.

languages.description: Wandle im Echo eines ätherischen Liedes.
languages.name: Ephemera: Seraphayre

languages.description: Marchez dans l'écho d'une chanson éthérée.
languages.name: Ephemera Seraphayre

languages.description: Cammina nell'eco di una canzone eterea.
languages.name: Ephemera Seraphayre

languages.description: 의식 깊은 곳에서 은은히 울리는 노래의 잔향 속에서 걸어 보세요.
languages.name: 세라페이어 이페메라

languages.description: Camina en el eco de una canción etérea.
languages.name: Efímero Seraphayre

languages.description: 走进空灵歌曲的回声中。
languages.name: 六翼天使幻纹

languages.description: 阿求の歌が鳴り響く道を進もう。
languages.name: Seraphayre エフェメラ

languages.description: Caminhe no eco de uma canção etérea.
languages.name: Efêmera: Seráfica

languages.description: 步入空靈又飄渺歌曲的迴聲之中。
languages.name: 六翼熾天使幻紋

languages.description: เดินอยู่ท่ามกลางเสียงก้องกังวานของเพลงที่ไร้ตัวตน
languages.name: อิเฟมเมอรา Seraphayre
